channel.title: Get Started on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Get Started on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials

item.title: How to Start a Web Design Agency
item.description: White Label Agency Dreaming of starting your own thing in the web world? If you’ve got skills in design and SEO, you can launch your own web design business with Site Bay backing you up.

item.title: How to Choose a Site Bay Plan
item.description: Site Bay offers four plan types: Micro, Starter, Business, and Enterprise. All our cool features? You get ’em with any plan you pick.

item.title: How to Pick a Data Center
item.description: tags: [“sitebay platform”] aliases: [’/platform/how-to-pick-a-data-center/'] So, you’re setting up your website and you’re hearing all this talk about data centers.

item.title: Accounts and Passwords
item.description: Email Addresses and Contact Information Yo, when you sign up with Site Bay, the email and contact info you drop with us?
